```{r setup}
library(bowAndArrow)
```


```{r potental_energy}
E_pot <- energy_bow(draw_weight_pounds = 30, draw_length_inches = 28)
```

```{r velocity}
velocity <- init_v(E_pot, m = 0.3)
```

```{r flight}
flight <- flight_arrow(velocity, angle_degrees = 45)
```

```{r plot_flight}
plot_flight(flight)
```
